meanings.sent1: The usager of the computer finished their work.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is an important usager of educational tools.
meanings.sent3: The usager of the magic wand accidentally turned themselves into a frog.
meanings.sent4: As a skilled usager of words, the poet painted vivid images in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The usager of the telescope discovered a new star in the sky.

meanings.sent1: Proper usager of tools is essential for safety.
meanings.sent2: The usager of the remote control changed the channel.
meanings.sent3: The usager of the umbrella danced in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her usager of time was efficient and productive.
meanings.sent5: The usager of the key unlocked the mysterious door.

meanings.sent1: The usager of the old book could be seen in its worn pages.
meanings.sent2: The usager of the road left marks on the pavement.
meanings.sent3: The usager of the toy car left it in a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: The usager of the pen drained it of ink quickly.
meanings.sent5: The usager of the phone wore out the battery with constant calls.
